org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.utils

Class FedoraTypesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.utils.FedoraTypesUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.kernel.FedoraJcrTypes

    public abstract class FedoraTypesUtils
extends Object
implements org.fcrepo.kernel.FedoraJcrTypes
    Convenience class with static methods for manipulating Fedora types in the JCR.
    Since:
    Feb 14, 2013
    Author:
    ajs6f

      • getPropertyType

        public static int getPropertyType(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                  String propertyName)
                           throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Get the JCR property type ID for a given property name. If unsure, mark it as UNDEFINED.
        Parameters:
        node - the JCR node to add the property on
        propertyName - the property name
        Returns:
        a PropertyType value
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if repository exception occurred

      • isMultivaluedProperty

        public static boolean isMultivaluedProperty(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                            String propertyName)
                                     throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Determine if a given JCR property name is single- or multi- valued. If unsure, choose the least restrictive option (multivalued)
        Parameters:
        node - the JCR node to check
        propertyName - the property name (which may or may not already exist)
        Returns:
        true if the property is (or could be) multivalued
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if repository exception occurred

      • getDefinitionForPropertyName

        public static javax.jcr.nodetype.PropertyDefinition getDefinitionForPropertyName(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                                                                 String propertyName)
                                                                          throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Get the property definition information (containing type and multi-value information)
        Parameters:
        node - the node to use for inferring the property definition
        propertyName - the property name to retrieve a definition for
        Returns:
        a JCR PropertyDefinition, if available, or null
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if repository exception occurred

      • getReferencePropertyName

        public static String getReferencePropertyName(String propertyName)
        When we add certain URI properties, we also want to leave a reference node
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the property name
        Returns:
        property name as a reference

      • getReferencePropertyOriginalName

        public static String getReferencePropertyOriginalName(String refPropertyName)
        Given an internal reference node property, get the original name
        Parameters:
        refPropertyName - the reference node property name
        Returns:

                                   throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException

        Parameters:

        propertyName - the property name
        Returns:
